name: scalable-userlogin-microservices
description: Scalable user login and registration system with microservices architecture capable of handling 100,000+ requests per second

scripts.dev:core: cd services && docker compose up --build postgres redis user-service-1 auth-service-1 api-gateway-1
scripts.dev:basic: cd services && docker compose up postgres redis user-service-1 auth-service-1 api-gateway-1
scripts.dev:clean: cd services && docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.dev:rebuild: npm run dev:clean && npm run install:all && npm run dev:core
scripts.install:all: npm run install:user && npm run install:auth && npm run install:gateway
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd services/user-service && npx prisma migrate dev

scripts.seed:status: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { const progress = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('seed-progress.json', 'utf8')); console.log('\nðŸ“Š Seeding Progress:'); console.log('â”œâ”€â”€ Users seeded:', progress.usersSeeded.toLocaleString()); console.log('â”œâ”€â”€ Batches completed:', progress.batchesCompleted.toLocaleString()); console.log('â”œâ”€â”€ Last batch ID:', progress.lastBatchId); console.log('â””â”€â”€ Progress:', ((progress.usersSeeded / 10000000) * 100).toFixed(2) + '%'); } catch(e) { console.log('âŒ No seeding in progress or completed'); }"
scripts.seed:count: node -e "const { PrismaClient } = require('@prisma/client'); const prisma = new PrismaClient(); prisma.user.count().then(count => { console.log('ðŸ“Š Total users in database:', count.toLocaleString()); prisma.\$disconnect(); }).catch(console.error);"
scripts.seed:full: npm run seed:optimize && npm run seed:10m && npm run seed:restore && npm run seed:verify
scripts.seed:dev: npm run seed:test:100k && npm run seed:verify
